scripts.runFeedLoader: cd ./podcast-feed-loader/app && npm install && npm run test && cd ../..
scripts.runWebsite: cd ./website-react && npm install && npm run jest && cd ..
scripts.runProxy: cd ./ssl-proxy && npm install && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.allTests: npm run runFeedLoader && npm run runWebsite && npm run runProxy
scripts.allLinters: npm run lintFeedLoader && npm run lintWebsite && npm run lintProxy
